description: Diagram showing a plant taking in sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide, and releasing oxygen and producing sugar.
Detailed diagram of a chloroplast showing its internal structures: outer membrane, inner membrane, stroma, thylakoids, and grana.

Flowchart showing the light-dependent reactions. Start with light hitting photosystem II, water splitting, electron transport chain, proton gradient, ATP synthase producing ATP, photosystem I, and finally NADP+ reductase producing NADPH. Show oxygen as a byproduct.
